title: Taffy Sinclair and the Melanie Make-over
description: When Taffy tells Melanie Edwards about a new modeling school, Melanie talks the Fabulous Five into signing up. Soon Melanie is spending lots of time with Taffy Sinclair, who's promised to get Melanie professional modeling jobs. The Fabulous Five know Taffy's up to something... Can they win Melanie back when Taffy is holding out the lure of a glamorous modeling career?
author: Betsy Haynes
